Invocation for the groom.ARABIC_TEXT: ((بَارَكَ اللَّهُ لَكَ، وَبَارَكَ عَلَيْكَ، وَجَمَعَ بَيْنَكُمَا فِي خَيْرٍ)).
Invocation for the groom.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Barakal-lahu lak, wabaraka AAalayk, wajamaAAa baynakuma fee khayr.)
Invocation for the groom.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (May Allah bless for you (your spouse) and bless you, and may He unite both of you in goodness.)
